description: Provide Aircraft Rental for Parachutists (Air Transport Services) for Skyhawks as per Supply Arrangement W6399-18KA26 on 2-3 June 2023 in Iroquois Falls ON and 6-11 June 2023 for North Bay Armed Forces Day, RBC Canadian Open and the Barrie Air Show.
tags: Air transportation support systems and equipment
full_summary:
### Aircraft Rental for Parachutists (Air Transport Services)
#### Solicitation Number: W2037-24-0022/A

This solicitation is for the provision of aircraft rental services for parachutists, specifically for Skyhawks, under a Supply Arrangement (SA) W6399-18KA26.

### Tender Details

*   **Publication Date:** May 17, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** May 31, 2023, 16:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Commencement Date:** June 2, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Expiration Date:** June 11, 2023
*   **Procurement Category:** Service
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Trade Agreements:**
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Service Requirements
The contractor must provide:

*   Aircraft rental services for Skyhawks
*   Air transport services for parachutists on June 2-3, 2023, in Iroquois Falls, ON
*   Air transport services for parachutists on June 6-11, 2023, for North Bay Armed Forces Day, RBC Canadian Open, and Barrie Air Show

### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents can be accessed via the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5601/24022n_npp_draft_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5601/24022n_npp_draft_0.pdf)

### Contact Information

For all inquiries and issues regarding this solicitation, please contact:

*   Name: Maura Archibald
*   Email: <maura.archibald@forces.gc.ca>
*   Phone: (506) 432-2731

Please note that expressions of interest should be sent via email by May 31, 2023. ###


The Notice Languagage have been kept in English only, but you can easily provide the French translation, versus the other language
